From October: Paul Englis, a community affairs manager at Microsoft, speaks to the Rome-Floyd County Development Authority about plans for a data center off Huffaker Road. The biggest business news for Floyd County, by far, in the past year was the announcement that Microsoft will invest $1 billion in a data center campus off Huffaker Road.
